Class Pollfds

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usb4java.Pollfds
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Pollfd>

    public final class Pollfds
extends Object
implements Iterable<Pollfd>
    List of poll file descriptors as returned by LibUsb.getPollfds(Context).
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)
